Tranquil_Abuse_Tooltip: Auto disassemble/reassemble Tranquil Boots based on nearby threats
Tranquil_Abuse_OnMyAttack_Tooltip: Treat your own attack projectiles as a threat trigger
Tranquil_Abuse_HoldDisassembleKey_Toolti: While held, disassembles Tranquils and keeps them disassembled
Khanda_Abuse_Tooltip: Prioritize Khanda on cast, then disassemble in cast window for Phylactery and reassemble
Khanda_Abuse_AntiStickCycle_Tooltip: Every 7 seconds sends queued Khanda disassemble to keep disassemble window alive
